issues.issue_title: Add Lina to credit for exclusive lists in release notes
issues.issue_body:
### Pitch

I see @necropolina with a [lot of commits](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/22048/commits), [handling change requests](https://github.com/dariusk/mastodon/pull/7) and [patches](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/22048#issuecomment-1425215489), and doing a lot to [push the exclusive lists feature forward](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/22048#issuecomment-1420303419), but I don't see them in the release notes! https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/releases/tag/v4.2.0-rc2








### Motivation

Love the feature, and ofc others contributed too! I assume it's just an oversight bc this is a big release but would love to see everyone get credit for contributing :). thanks for all y'alls work on upcoming 4.2 and all the rest!

issues.issue_title: WebUI reloading page if you scroll to the bottom of search results
issues.issue_body:
### Steps to reproduce the problem

1. Go to: https://mastodon.social/search
2. Enter Search Term e.g. "Petition"
3. Search for Posts
4. scroll down the results
5. At some point the UI will just reload and push you back to the top of the results
...


### Expected behaviour

More results should be shown without any reloading and scrolling 

### Actual behaviour

UI reloads 

### Detailed description

Could be related to #26959
It seems that fetching more posts causes the UI to rerender the entire search results page.

### Mastodon instance

mastodon.social

### Mastodon version

v4.2.0-nightly.2023-09-21

### Browser name and version

Safari@16.6

### Operating system

macOS@13.5.2

### Technical details

_No response_

commit.commit_title: Change S3 checksum mode to be disabled by default (#27007)

prs.pr_title: Change S3 checksum mode to be disabled by default
prs.pr_body:
This removes the `S3_DISABLE_CHECKSUM_MODE` env variable and introduces the `S3_ENABLE_CHECKSUM_MODE` env variable instead.

The reason is that it seems that more people use S3-compatible providers which do not implement this feature (and thus error out if enabled) than S3-compatible providers which do implement it (which might be AWS S3 only).

Changes from v4.2.0-rc2:

### Added

- Add `hide_collections`, `discoverable` and `indexable` attributes to credentials API ([ClearlyClaire](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/26998))

### Changed

- Change S3 checksum mode to be disabled by default ([ClearlyClaire](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/27007))

### Fixed

- Fix search results temporarily disappearing while scrolling and loading more results ([ClearlyClaire](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/27014))
- Fix migration of disabled old-style settings ([ClearlyClaire](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/27012))
- Fix incorrect PostgreSQL version check ([ClearlyClaire](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/pull/26979))
